personalInfo.name: Nguyen Thien Nam
personalInfo.title: A Multi-Talented Individual in Art, Music, Development, Content Creation, and Story Writing
personalInfo.biography: I am a homeschooled student who began drawing and playing piano at the age of 6. At 12, I started coding, and at 13, I picked up the saxophone. Despite facing challenges like periods of depression, I have grown into a positive and healthy 15-year-old. I enjoy exploring various creative fields and continually developing my skills.

development.name: M4sk Discord Bot
development.description: A versatile Discord bot offering fun and utility commands, including an economy system and RPG adventure game. Features customizable responses, embeds, and colors via a simple dashboard.

development.name: The Blood of Heroes
development.description: A Discord bot that allows users to create and manage servers. Features customizable responses, embeds, and colors via a simple dashboard.

art.title: My Imagination
art.description: An artwork representing my mental and psychological self, created purely from imagination.

art.title: My Universe
art.description: An artwork representing my imagination about space, solar systems, and other aspects of the universe.

music.title: Careless Whisper Performance
music.description: A saxophone performance at Polygon in Hanoi, Vietnam, on May 25.

contentCreation.description: A collection of simple vlogs documenting my life and experiences.
